of enemy forces

a weakness 
buff with 4 units of ap 
decrease to all forces 
which exist at hero row

applies a

increment ap on itself 
for the rest of the game

has 3 units 
of holy buffs for the 
rest of the game

force

enemy forces for 1 turn

heroes.name: Zahak

on attack 
poisons the card for 
3 turns

powers with 6 units of

for 1 turn 
disarms them all

all of enemies 
poisoned for 4 turns

negative buffs

spells.description:
destroys enemy 
positive buff and self 
negative buff

spells.name: Empower
spells.description:
power buff that 
adds 2 units to ap

spells.name: Fireball
spells.description:
weakness buff 
that reduces one enemy hp 
for 4 units

spells.name: GodStrength
spells.description:
power buff that 
adds 4 units to hero ap

spells.name: HealthWithProfit
spells.description:
weakness buff 
with 6 units of life loss
 but has 2 holy buffs 
for 3 turns

spells.range:
an enemy minion in 
8 blocks radius
spells.name: KingsGuard
spells.description:
a weakness buff
 with infinite amount
 of ap decrease

spells.name: LightingBolt
spells.description:
weakness buff 
with 8 units of hp 
decrease from enemy hero

spells.name: Madness
spells.description:
power buff that
 for 3 turns adds 4 units 
to ap of the one it was
 applied on but disarms itself

spells.name: PosionLake
spells.description:
for 1 turn makes 
the block poison blocks

spells.name: PowerUp
spells.description:
a power buff with
 6 units of ap increase

spells.name: Sacrifice
spells.description:
power buff add 
minion current hp to hero hp 
and kills the minion

spells.name: Shock
spells.description:
is stunned for 
2 turns

spells.name: TotalDisarm
spells.description:
disarmed for the 
rest of the game

spells.name: Weakening
spells.description:
a weakness buff 
with 4 units of ap decrease

items.desc:
When placing any 
self force, one unit 
attacks the enemy's hero

holy buff for 
2 turn for each minion 
that enters the game

if self hero is ranged
 or hybrid, while attack 
disarms the enemy for 
one turn

for all turns add
 1 mp

activates 12 units 
of holy buffs in self hero

for hybrid and 
ranged decreases hero enemy
 ap by 2 units

When attack 
by force, it forces the poison
 buff on the enemy's random
 power for 1 turn

own hero disarms 
enemy`s force for 1 turn 
if attacked

At the time of 
the death of each force,
 a power buff is applied to 
one of the forces that 
increases ap

in first 3 turns
 adds 1 unit to mp

When attacked, 
weakness buff will be 
applied with 2 units of
 decreases in ap for an 
enemy's random power

collectibles.desc: increases attack power 6 units for random force
applies a power buff with 3 units of hp and ap increase
at the next turn increases 3 mp
active 10 units of holy buff for random self force for 2 turns
gives a random minion the ability to apply a weakness buff of 8 units to one of people close to it
gives a random force a power buff of 6 units for hp
applies a power buff of 2 units of ap for a random force in map
get 5 units attack power to melee force
increases 2 units of ap for 1 force (random ranged or hybrid)

items.desc:
activates 12 units 
of holy buffs in self hero

for hybrid and 
ranged decreases hero enemy
 ap by 2 units

When placing any 
self force, one unit 
attacks the enemy's hero

When attack 
by force, it forces the poison
 buff on the enemy's random
 power for 1 turn

in first 3 turns
 adds 1 unit to mp

At the time of 
the death of each force,
 a power buff is applied to 
one of the forces that 
increases ap

for all turns add
 1 mp

holy buff for 
2 turn for each minion 
that enters the game

own hero disarms 
enemy`s force for 1 turn 
if attacked

When attacked, 
weakness buff will be 
applied with 2 units of
 decreases in ap for an 
enemy's random power

if self hero is ranged
 or hybrid, while attack 
disarms the enemy for 
one turn

at the next turn increases 3 mp
active 10 units of holy buff for random self force for 2 turns
increases attack power 6 units for random force
applies a power buff of 2 units of ap for a random force in map
